body:
This guild is unequivocally retarded and so is anyone who takes it seriously. People have forgotten what shill even means and throw it around just like the word racism or bigot and it has lost its meaning (not that ruqqusers used it in right context anyway). A shill is someone who is paid to sell something, whether it be a product or an idea. As much as you'd like your CCP or (((jews))) own and control everything conspiracy theory to come to, it really isn't, especially on ruqqus. No one is being paid to promote/subvert ideologies on an obscure site that no one except old users and right wingers care about. 

Any "shills" are trolls who joined in after the +The_DonaId seethe that we created. A few of them are older trolls who went silent until recently because of the seethe from the echo-chamber while others are newer ones. These people have two ways of trolling, either going against the echo-chamber (which most do), or LARPing so far right it even makes those in the echo-chamber surprised. This is evidenced by the timing that these people started trolling, around election days and after that (the same time +The_DonaId was created). For them to join they have to be at least 1 month old users for them to know about the "takeover" and start trolling. This rules out the possibility that AHS or redditors were behind this. These trolls are likely alts for old users who use them to troll. Also +The_DonaId was coordinated by a few of us on discord to generate seethe as we were tired of the echo-chamber and wasn't because of shills or even Deux, with the only connection being Carp. Nobody on +The_DonaId is a shill. Same goes for +DeuxRAMA. It seems like the rightoid seriousposters either don't know or have forgotten the original purpose of that subreddit/guild, which is to indulge in drama and make it as fun as possible by not taking it seriously. 

If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well, all by a few of us on discord writing ridiculous statements. The fact that anyone even took it seriously shows how deep they are into the echo-chamber and unable to detect any satire or irony. This was started by people with relatively higher rep and since this was on discord, we eventually were able to get more people with high rep and influence on board. We even got kek to join on the last day. If you spent a fair amount of time on ruqqus discord (or even ruqqus), you'd recognize these names as being older users who contributed a lot to the site. The fact that no one even bothered going through the profiles makes me question if you even bothered doing any research before declaring everyone shills, most of whom had public profiles until recently. Many of these are the very people who were behind creating the good parts about the site, before voatcels took over. Also, there have been no examples of this so called "subversion" of this site except Klens guilds (on his alt accounts) being taken after he got temporarily banned. If you think more people shitting on far righters after the trolling started is evidence for shills it isn't because of shills, but because you've exposed your stupidity and are getting shit on for it. People disagreeing with you more now isn't "subversion". If you don't know this already, @Sion321 is an alt for @Emerald41, not some "whistleblower". Evidence: [1](https://ruqqus.com/+TheMemery/post/5r1h/so-sion123-was-threatened-with-a/jwmg), [2](https://imgur.com/qA3qWdb), [3](https://ruqqus.com/+DumpsterFire/post/5r3w/when-you-get-your-feelings-hurt/jwr1). Everyone in this guild fell for the bait, even though we even made it so easy to recognize. This easily destroys any form of credibility this guild has. It has done nothing valuable except expose the retardation of average ruqqusers. 

I don't expect you to take this seriously given how retarded you have to be to get here in the first place, but let this be a moment for self reflection that you're in the echo-chamber so deep that you've forgotten that people who disagree normally, people who troll, and people in the center even fucking exist and its all an us vs them mentality. The average ruqquser doesn't care about free speech anymore and are willing to censor those who disagree by means such as labelling them as shills in hopes for the admins to get them banned. I've lost hope in this site. I'll likely give up on ruqqus soon since the echo-chamber will only get worse until the update and even the update might not be enough to salvage this site. The echo-chamber is actively what is will kill this site.

It has done nothing valuable except expose the retardation of average ruqqusers.

I don't expect you to take this seriously given how retarded you have to be to get here in the first place, but let this be a moment for self reflection that you're in the echo-chamber so deep that you've forgotten that people who disagree normally, people who troll, and people in the center even fucking exist and its all an us vs them mentality. post.body:
This guild is unequivocally retarded and so is anyone who takes it seriously. People have forgotten what shill even means and throw it around just like the word racism or bigot and it has lost its meaning (not that ruqqusers used it in right context anyway). A shill is someone who is paid to sell something, whether it be a product or an idea. As much as you'd like your CCP or (((jews))) own and control everything conspiracy theory to come to, it really isn't, especially on ruqqus. No one is being paid to promote/subvert ideologies on an obscure site that no one except old users and right wingers care about. 

Any "shills" are trolls who joined in after the +The_DonaId seethe that we created. A few of them are older trolls who went silent until recently because of the seethe from the echo-chamber while others are newer ones. These people have two ways of trolling, either going against the echo-chamber (which most do), or LARPing so far right it even makes those in the echo-chamber surprised. This is evidenced by the timing that these people started trolling, around election days and after that (the same time +The_DonaId was created). For them to join they have to be at least 1 month old users for them to know about the "takeover" and start trolling. This rules out the possibility that AHS or redditors were behind this. These trolls are likely alts for old users who use them to troll. Also +The_DonaId was coordinated by a few of us on discord to generate seethe as we were tired of the echo-chamber and wasn't because of shills or even Deux, with the only connection being Carp. Nobody on +The_DonaId is a shill. Same goes for +DeuxRAMA. It seems like the rightoid seriousposters either don't know or have forgotten the original purpose of that subreddit/guild, which is to indulge in drama and make it as fun as possible by not taking it seriously. 

If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well, all by a few of us on discord writing ridiculous statements. The fact that anyone even took it seriously shows how deep they are into the echo-chamber and unable to detect any satire or irony. This was started by people with relatively higher rep and since this was on discord, we eventually were able to get more people with high rep and influence on board. We even got kek to join on the last day. If you spent a fair amount of time on ruqqus discord (or even ruqqus), you'd recognize these names as being older users who contributed a lot to the site. The fact that no one even bothered going through the profiles makes me question if you even bothered doing any research before declaring everyone shills, most of whom had public profiles until recently. Many of these are the very people who were behind creating the good parts about the site, before voatcels took over. Also, there have been no examples of this so called "subversion" of this site except Klens guilds (on his alt accounts) being taken after he got temporarily banned. If you think more people shitting on far righters after the trolling started is evidence for shills it isn't because of shills, but because you've exposed your stupidity and are getting shit on for it. People disagreeing with you more now isn't "subversion". If you don't know this already, @Sion321 is an alt for @Emerald41, not some "whistleblower". Evidence: [1](https://ruqqus.com/+TheMemery/post/5r1h/so-sion123-was-threatened-with-a/jwmg), [2](https://imgur.com/qA3qWdb), [3](https://ruqqus.com/+DumpsterFire/post/5r3w/when-you-get-your-feelings-hurt/jwr1). Everyone in this guild fell for the bait, even though we even made it so easy to recognize. This easily destroys any form of credibility this guild has. It has done nothing valuable except expose the retardation of average ruqqusers. 

I don't expect you to take this seriously given how retarded you have to be to get here in the first place, but let this be a moment for self reflection that you're in the echo-chamber so deep that you've forgotten that people who disagree normally, people who troll, and people in the center even fucking exist and its all an us vs them mentality. The average ruqquser doesn't care about free speech anymore and are willing to censor those who disagree by means such as labelling them as shills in hopes for the admins to get them banned. I've lost hope in this site. I'll likely give up on ruqqus soon since the echo-chamber will only get worse until the update and even the update might not be enough to salvage this site. The echo-chamber is actively what is will kill this site.

post.title: The difference between "trolls" and "shills"

body:
One has an agenda, the other wants lulz.

However, it is documented fact the CCP has shills active all over the internet and even in the physical world.

I stopped bothering to check profiles because anyone of consequence has their profile set to private- hence my bio.

I was the 3rd member of this guild.  This was my comment on the original post-



>It bears saying- Opposing view =/= shilling. Some people hold contrary views. A shill is someone with an agenda to push and is actively looking to shift public opinion with their actions. We're already walking a fine line here on Ruqqus in that we are pretty quickly becoming a rightwing echo chamber and chasing off anyone who holds an opposing view. It's important to specify a pattern of behavior and not just a history of contrary views.  If we want to remain a "free speech platform," then we need to hold free speech as the gold standard and not shame or censor people for simply having a different opinion.

This guild may be populated by retards, but Poe's Law remains at play and nothing creates more retards than feeding the retardation.  Your prophecy is self-fulfilling and you create the issue you proclaim as being critical to this site's downfall.

In short- go fuck yourself you fucking fuck and fuck off with your little clique of Discord circle jerks and go Dutch oven one another somewhere where no one gives a shit about you.  So, I guess that means stay here and keep doing what you're doing.
body_html:
One has an agenda, the other wants lulz.

However, it is documented fact the CCP has shills active all over the internet and even in the physical world.

I stopped bothering to check profiles because anyone of consequence has their profile set to private- hence my bio.

I was the 3rd member of this guild. This was my comment on the original post-

It bears saying- Opposing view =/= shilling. Some people hold contrary views. A shill is someone with an agenda to push and is actively looking to shift public opinion with their actions. We're already walking a fine line here on Ruqqus in that we are pretty quickly becoming a rightwing echo chamber and chasing off anyone who holds an opposing view. It's important to specify a pattern of behavior and not just a history of contrary views. If we want to remain a "free speech platform," then we need to hold free speech as the gold standard and not shame or censor people for simply having a different opinion.

This guild may be populated by retards, but Poe's Law remains at play and nothing creates more retards than feeding the retardation. Your prophecy is self-fulfilling and you create the issue you proclaim as being critical to this site's downfall.

In short- go fuck yourself you fucking fuck and fuck off with your little clique of Discord circle jerks and go Dutch oven one another somewhere where no one gives a shit about you. So, I guess that means stay here and keep doing what you're doing.

A few of them are older trolls who went silent until recently because of the seethe from the echo-chamber while others are newer ones. These people have two ways of trolling, either going against the echo-chamber (which most do), or LARPing so far right it even makes those in the echo-chamber surprised. This is evidenced by the timing that these people started trolling, around election days and after that (the same time +The_DonaId was created). For them to join they have to be at least 1 month old users for them to know about the "takeover" and start trolling. This rules out the possibility that AHS or redditors were behind this. These trolls are likely alts for old users who use them to troll. Also +The_DonaId was coordinated by a few of us on discord to generate seethe as we were tired of the echo-chamber and wasn't because of shills or even Deux, with the only connection being Carp. Nobody on +The_DonaId is a shill. Same goes for +DeuxRAMA. It seems like the rightoid seriousposters either don't know or have forgotten the original purpose of that subreddit/guild, which is to indulge in drama and make it as fun as possible by not taking it seriously. 

If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well, all by a few of us on discord writing ridiculous statements. The fact that anyone even took it seriously shows how deep they are into the echo-chamber and unable to detect any satire or irony. This was started by people with relatively higher rep and since this was on discord, we eventually were able to get more people with high rep and influence on board. We even got kek to join on the last day. If you spent a fair amount of time on ruqqus discord (or even ruqqus), you'd recognize these names as being older users who contributed a lot to the site. The fact that no one even bothered going through the profiles makes me question if you even bothered doing any research before declaring everyone shills, most of whom had public profiles until recently. Many of these are the very people who were behind creating the good parts about the site, before voatcels took over. Also, there have been no examples of this so called "subversion" of this site except Klens guilds (on his alt accounts) being taken after he got temporarily banned. If you think more people shitting on far righters after the trolling started is evidence for shills it isn't because of shills, but because you've exposed your stupidity and are getting shit on for it. People disagreeing with you more now isn't "subversion". If you don't know this already, @Sion321 is an alt for @Emerald41, not some "whistleblower". Evidence: [1](https://ruqqus.com/+TheMemery/post/5r1h/so-sion123-was-threatened-with-a/jwmg), [2](https://imgur.com/qA3qWdb), [3](https://ruqqus.com/+DumpsterFire/post/5r3w/when-you-get-your-feelings-hurt/jwr1). Everyone in this guild fell for the bait, even though we even made it so easy to recognize. This easily destroys any form of credibility this guild has. It has done nothing valuable except expose the retardation of average ruqqusers. 

I don't expect you to take this seriously given how retarded you have to be to get here in the first place, but let this be a moment for self reflection that you're in the echo-chamber so deep that you've forgotten that people who disagree normally, people who troll, and people in the center even fucking exist and its all an us vs them mentality. The average ruqquser doesn't care about free speech anymore and are willing to censor those who disagree by means such as labelling them as shills in hopes for the admins to get them banned. I've lost hope in this site. I'll likely give up on ruqqus soon since the echo-chamber will only get worse until the update and even the update might not be enough to salvage this site. The echo-chamber is actively what is will kill this site.

body:
TL;DR "We're not shills. We're mostly older users who have contributed a lot to the site, and we were just trolling in order to have fun and generate seethe. I can't believe you fell for the bait. I've lost hope in Ruqqus because it feels like an echo chamber where others will label you as a shill and try to ban you if you disagree with them."

10 word summary: "No shilling, only trolling, stop being stupid, ruqqus sucks now"

The echo-chamber is actively what is will kill this site.

For them to join they have to be at least 1 month old users for them to know about the "takeover" and start trolling. This rules out the possibility that AHS or redditors were behind this. These trolls are likely alts for old users who use them to troll. Also +The_DonaId was coordinated by a few of us on discord to generate seethe as we were tired of the echo-chamber and wasn't because of shills or even Deux, with the only connection being Carp. Nobody on +The_DonaId is a shill. Same goes for +DeuxRAMA. It seems like the rightoid seriousposters either don't know or have forgotten the original purpose of that subreddit/guild, which is to indulge in drama and make it as fun as possible by not taking it seriously.

If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well, all by a few of us on discord writing ridiculous statements. The fact that anyone even took it seriously shows how deep they are into the echo-chamber and unable to detect any satire or irony. This was started by people with relatively higher rep and since this was on discord, we eventually were able to get more people with high rep and influence on board. We even got kek to join on the last day. If you spent a fair amount of time on ruqqus discord (or even ruqqus), you'd recognize these names as being older users who contributed a lot to the site. The fact that no one even bothered going through the profiles makes me question if you even bothered doing any research before declaring everyone shills, most of whom had public profiles until recently. Many of these are the very people who were behind creating the good parts about the site, before voatcels took over. Also, there have been no examples of this so called "subversion" of this site except Klens guilds (on his alt accounts) being taken after he got temporarily banned. If you think more people shitting on far righters after the trolling started is evidence for shills it isn't because of shills, but because you've exposed your stupidity and are getting shit on for it. People disagreeing with you more now isn't "subversion". If you don't know this already, @Sion321 is an alt for @Emerald41, not some "whistleblower". Evidence: 1, 2, 3. Everyone in this guild fell for the bait, even though we even made it so easy to recognize. This easily destroys any form of credibility this guild has. It has done nothing valuable except expose the retardation of average ruqqusers.

I don't expect you to take this seriously given how retarded you have to be to get here in the first place, but let this be a moment for self reflection that you're in the echo-chamber so deep that you've forgotten that people who disagree normally, people who troll, and people in the center even fucking exist and its all an us vs them mentality. The average ruqquser doesn't care about free speech anymore and are willing to censor those who disagree by means such as labelling them as shills in hopes for the admins to get them banned. I've lost hope in this site. I'll likely give up on ruqqus soon since the echo-chamber will only get worse until the update and even the update might not be enough to salvage this site. The echo-chamber is actively what is will kill this site.

post.title: The difference between "trolls" and "shills"

body:
> This guild is unequivocally retarded and so is anyone who takes it seriously. People have forgotten what shill even means and throw it around just like the word racism or bigot and it has lost its meaning (not that ruqqusers used it in right context anyway). A shill is someone who is paid to sell something, whether it be a product or an idea. As much as you'd like your CCP or (((jews))) own and control everything conspiracy theory to come to, it really isn't, especially on ruqqus. No one is being paid to promote/subvert ideologies on an obscure site that no one except old users and right wingers care about.

A shill is anybody who promotes an agenda, consistently. They can be paid, and the agenda can be a product / service /idea, but they could also be radicals, 

> <long text> ...  These people have two ways of trolling, either going against the echo-chamber (which most do), or LARPing so far right it even makes those in the echo-chamber surprised. .. Nobody on +The_DonaId is a shill. Same goes for +DeuxRAMA.

I never have claimed **everybody** in those guilds is a shill. [Here is literally what I said about this](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5poi/shills-dont-even-bother-denything-what/js1s). I know most people are just autistic trolls.  

That being said, I do have reason to believe they are ledt by a few shills, who are coordinating the "le ebic trolling", as it "just happens" to coincide with a propaganda campaign by the left and have the exact same effect. If it walks like a duck ,and quacks like a duck, nobody cares you call it a zebra.

> If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well..

Which was obvious, which is why, unlike my many other posts in here, [every](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5emh/alleged-shill-activity-coordination-on-discord) [post](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5lzz/alleged-shill-activity-coordination-on-discord) about it on this guild had **ALLEGED** both in the title, and when talking about the users. Notice it's not the case on any other post.

## This Post Addresses a Strawman  

You can keep talking how everybody fell for you "le ebic bait".  

The actual shilling was not the trolling - it was the few organizers coordinated trolling (maybe even just one of them convining others to do it "for the lulz") targeting a very specific subject, who just "happens" to coincide with an ongoing shilling campaign by the MSM propaganda machine.   

The "subversion", and pretending people fell for it, is an attempt to divert people from this fact, trying to make them think this guild is about that - it isn't. As you well know, most people related to this (except those who spammed this guild) are neither exiled nor mentioned in the threads here. This guild is meant for actual shills, not the useful autists.  

Anyway, I'll let you continue circlejerking and pretending like you made some grand point there. Have fun! Le epic drama!

> <long text> ...  These people have two ways of trolling, either going against the echo-chamber (which most do), or LARPing so far right it even makes those in the echo-chamber surprised. .. Nobody on +The_DonaId is a shill. Same goes for +DeuxRAMA.

That being said, I do have reason to believe they are ledt by a few shills, who are coordinating the "le ebic trolling", as it "just happens" to coincide with a propaganda campaign by the left and have the exact same effect. If it walks like a duck ,and quacks like a duck, nobody cares you call it a zebra.

> If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well..

Which was obvious, which is why, unlike my many other posts in here, [every](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5emh/alleged-shill-activity-coordination-on-discord) [post](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5lzz/alleged-shill-activity-coordination-on-discord) about it on this guild had **ALLEGED** both in the title, and when talking about the users. Notice it's not the case on any other post.

## This Post Addresses a Strawman  

You can keep talking how everybody fell for you "le ebic bait".  

The actual shilling was not the trolling - it was the few organizers coordinated trolling (maybe even just one of them convining others to do it "for the lulz") targeting a very specific subject, who just "happens" to coincide with an ongoing shilling campaign by the MSM propaganda machine.   

The "subversion", and pretending people fell for it, is an attempt to divert people from this fact, trying to make them think this guild is about that - it isn't. As you well know, most people related to this (except those who spammed this guild) are neither exiled nor mentioned in the threads here. This guild is meant for actual shills, not the useful autists.  

Anyway, I'll let you continue circlejerking and pretending like you made some grand point there. Have fun! Le epic drama!

This is evidenced by the timing that these people started trolling, around election days and after that (the same time +The_DonaId was created). For them to join they have to be at least 1 month old users for them to know about the "takeover" and start trolling. This rules out the possibility that AHS or redditors were behind this. These trolls are likely alts for old users who use them to troll. Also +The_DonaId was coordinated by a few of us on discord to generate seethe as we were tired of the echo-chamber and wasn't because of shills or even Deux, with the only connection being Carp. Nobody on +The_DonaId is a shill. Same goes for +DeuxRAMA. It seems like the rightoid seriousposters either don't know or have forgotten the original purpose of that subreddit/guild, which is to indulge in drama and make it as fun as possible by not taking it seriously. 

If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well, all by a few of us on discord writing ridiculous statements. The fact that anyone even took it seriously shows how deep they are into the echo-chamber and unable to detect any satire or irony. This was started by people with relatively higher rep and since this was on discord, we eventually were able to get more people with high rep and influence on board. We even got kek to join on the last day. If you spent a fair amount of time on ruqqus discord (or even ruqqus), you'd recognize these names as being older users who contributed a lot to the site. The fact that no one even bothered going through the profiles makes me question if you even bothered doing any research before declaring everyone shills, most of whom had public profiles until recently. Many of these are the very people who were behind creating the good parts about the site, before voatcels took over. Also, there have been no examples of this so called "subversion" of this site except Klens guilds (on his alt accounts) being taken after he got temporarily banned. If you think more people shitting on far righters after the trolling started is evidence for shills it isn't because of shills, but because you've exposed your stupidity and are getting shit on for it. People disagreeing with you more now isn't "subversion". If you don't know this already, @Sion321 is an alt for @Emerald41, not some "whistleblower". Evidence: [1](https://ruqqus.com/+TheMemery/post/5r1h/so-sion123-was-threatened-with-a/jwmg), [2](https://imgur.com/qA3qWdb), [3](https://ruqqus.com/+DumpsterFire/post/5r3w/when-you-get-your-feelings-hurt/jwr1). Everyone in this guild fell for the bait, even though we even made it so easy to recognize. This easily destroys any form of credibility this guild has. It has done nothing valuable except expose the retardation of average ruqqusers. 

I don't expect you to take this seriously given how retarded you have to be to get here in the first place, but let this be a moment for self reflection that you're in the echo-chamber so deep that you've forgotten that people who disagree normally, people who troll, and people in the center even fucking exist and its all an us vs them mentality. The average ruqquser doesn't care about free speech anymore and are willing to censor those who disagree by means such as labelling them as shills in hopes for the admins to get them banned. I've lost hope in this site. I'll likely give up on ruqqus soon since the echo-chamber will only get worse until the update and even the update might not be enough to salvage this site. The echo-chamber is actively what is will kill this site.

> This guild is unequivocally retarded and so is anyone who takes it seriously. A shill is anybody who promotes an agenda, consistently. They can be paid, and the agenda can be a product / service /idea, but they could also be radicals, 

> <long text> ...  These people have two ways of trolling, either going against the echo-chamber (which most do), or LARPing so far right it even makes those in the echo-chamber surprised. .. Nobody on +The_DonaId is a shill. Same goes for +DeuxRAMA.

I never have claimed **everybody** in those guilds is a shill. [Here is literally what I said about this](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5poi/shills-dont-even-bother-denything-what/js1s). I know most people are just autistic trolls.  

That being said, I do have reason to believe they are ledt by a few shills, who are coordinating the "le ebic trolling", as it "just happens" to coincide with a propaganda campaign by the left and have the exact same effect. If it walks like a duck ,and quacks like a duck, nobody cares you call it a zebra.

> If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well..

Which was obvious, which is why, unlike my many other posts in here, [every](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5emh/alleged-shill-activity-coordination-on-discord) [post](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5lzz/alleged-shill-activity-coordination-on-discord) about it on this guild had **ALLEGED** both in the title, and when talking about the users. Notice it's not the case on any other post.

## This Post Addresses a Strawman  

You can keep talking how everybody fell for you "le ebic bait".  

The actual shilling was not the trolling - it was the few organizers coordinated trolling (maybe even just one of them convining others to do it "for the lulz") targeting a very specific subject, who just "happens" to coincide with an ongoing shilling campaign by the MSM propaganda machine.   

The "subversion", and pretending people fell for it, is an attempt to divert people from this fact, trying to make them think this guild is about that - it isn't. As you well know, most people related to this (except those who spammed this guild) are neither exiled nor mentioned in the threads here. This guild is meant for actual shills, not the useful autists.  

Anyway, I'll let you continue circlejerking and pretending like you made some grand point there. Have fun! Le epic drama!

post.body:
This guild is unequivocally retarded and so is anyone who takes it seriously. People have forgotten what shill even means and throw it around just like the word racism or bigot and it has lost its meaning (not that ruqqusers used it in right context anyway). A shill is someone who is paid to sell something, whether it be a product or an idea. As much as you'd like your CCP or (((jews))) own and control everything conspiracy theory to come to, it really isn't, especially on ruqqus. No one is being paid to promote/subvert ideologies on an obscure site that no one except old users and right wingers care about. 

Any "shills" are trolls who joined in after the +The_DonaId seethe that we created. A few of them are older trolls who went silent until recently because of the seethe from the echo-chamber while others are newer ones. These people have two ways of trolling, either going against the echo-chamber (which most do), or LARPing so far right it even makes those in the echo-chamber surprised. This is evidenced by the timing that these people started trolling, around election days and after that (the same time +The_DonaId was created). For them to join they have to be at least 1 month old users for them to know about the "takeover" and start trolling. This rules out the possibility that AHS or redditors were behind this. These trolls are likely alts for old users who use them to troll. Also +The_DonaId was coordinated by a few of us on discord to generate seethe as we were tired of the echo-chamber and wasn't because of shills or even Deux, with the only connection being Carp. Nobody on +The_DonaId is a shill. Same goes for +DeuxRAMA. It seems like the rightoid seriousposters either don't know or have forgotten the original purpose of that subreddit/guild, which is to indulge in drama and make it as fun as possible by not taking it seriously. 

If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well, all by a few of us on discord writing ridiculous statements. The fact that anyone even took it seriously shows how deep they are into the echo-chamber and unable to detect any satire or irony. This was started by people with relatively higher rep and since this was on discord, we eventually were able to get more people with high rep and influence on board. We even got kek to join on the last day. If you spent a fair amount of time on ruqqus discord (or even ruqqus), you'd recognize these names as being older users who contributed a lot to the site. The fact that no one even bothered going through the profiles makes me question if you even bothered doing any research before declaring everyone shills, most of whom had public profiles until recently. Many of these are the very people who were behind creating the good parts about the site, before voatcels took over. Also, there have been no examples of this so called "subversion" of this site except Klens guilds (on his alt accounts) being taken after he got temporarily banned. If you think more people shitting on far righters after the trolling started is evidence for shills it isn't because of shills, but because you've exposed your stupidity and are getting shit on for it. People disagreeing with you more now isn't "subversion". If you don't know this already, @Sion321 is an alt for @Emerald41, not some "whistleblower". Evidence: [1](https://ruqqus.com/+TheMemery/post/5r1h/so-sion123-was-threatened-with-a/jwmg), [2](https://imgur.com/qA3qWdb), [3](https://ruqqus.com/+DumpsterFire/post/5r3w/when-you-get-your-feelings-hurt/jwr1). Everyone in this guild fell for the bait, even though we even made it so easy to recognize. This easily destroys any form of credibility this guild has. It has done nothing valuable except expose the retardation of average ruqqusers. 

I don't expect you to take this seriously given how retarded you have to be to get here in the first place, but let this be a moment for self reflection that you're in the echo-chamber so deep that you've forgotten that people who disagree normally, people who troll, and people in the center even fucking exist and its all an us vs them mentality. The average ruqquser doesn't care about free speech anymore and are willing to censor those who disagree by means such as labelling them as shills in hopes for the admins to get them banned. I've lost hope in this site. I'll likely give up on ruqqus soon since the echo-chamber will only get worse until the update and even the update might not be enough to salvage this site. The echo-chamber is actively what is will kill this site.

Also +The_DonaId was coordinated by a few of us on discord to generate seethe as we were tired of the echo-chamber and wasn't because of shills or even Deux, with the only connection being Carp. Nobody on +The_DonaId is a shill. Same goes for +DeuxRAMA. It seems like the rightoid seriousposters either don't know or have forgotten the original purpose of that subreddit/guild, which is to indulge in drama and make it as fun as possible by not taking it seriously. 

If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well, all by a few of us on discord writing ridiculous statements. The fact that anyone even took it seriously shows how deep they are into the echo-chamber and unable to detect any satire or irony. This was started by people with relatively higher rep and since this was on discord, we eventually were able to get more people with high rep and influence on board. We even got kek to join on the last day. If you spent a fair amount of time on ruqqus discord (or even ruqqus), you'd recognize these names as being older users who contributed a lot to the site. The fact that no one even bothered going through the profiles makes me question if you even bothered doing any research before declaring everyone shills, most of whom had public profiles until recently. Many of these are the very people who were behind creating the good parts about the site, before voatcels took over. Also, there have been no examples of this so called "subversion" of this site except Klens guilds (on his alt accounts) being taken after he got temporarily banned. If you think more people shitting on far righters after the trolling started is evidence for shills it isn't because of shills, but because you've exposed your stupidity and are getting shit on for it. People disagreeing with you more now isn't "subversion". If you don't know this already, @Sion321 is an alt for @Emerald41, not some "whistleblower". Evidence: [1](https://ruqqus.com/+TheMemery/post/5r1h/so-sion123-was-threatened-with-a/jwmg), [2](https://imgur.com/qA3qWdb), [3](https://ruqqus.com/+DumpsterFire/post/5r3w/when-you-get-your-feelings-hurt/jwr1). Everyone in this guild fell for the bait, even though we even made it so easy to recognize. This easily destroys any form of credibility this guild has. It has done nothing valuable except expose the retardation of average ruqqusers. 

I don't expect you to take this seriously given how retarded you have to be to get here in the first place, but let this be a moment for self reflection that you're in the echo-chamber so deep that you've forgotten that people who disagree normally, people who troll, and people in the center even fucking exist and its all an us vs them mentality. The average ruqquser doesn't care about free speech anymore and are willing to censor those who disagree by means such as labelling them as shills in hopes for the admins to get them banned. I've lost hope in this site. I'll likely give up on ruqqus soon since the echo-chamber will only get worse until the update and even the update might not be enough to salvage this site. The echo-chamber is actively what is will kill this site.

> If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well..

Notice it's not the case on any other post.

## This Post Addresses a Strawman  

You can keep talking how everybody fell for you "le ebic bait".  

The actual shilling was not the trolling - it was the few organizers coordinated trolling (maybe even just one of them convining others to do it "for the lulz") targeting a very specific subject, who just "happens" to coincide with an ongoing shilling campaign by the MSM propaganda machine.

This guild is meant for actual shills, not the useful autists.  

Anyway, I'll let you continue circlejerking and pretending like you made some grand point there. Have fun! Le epic drama!

The echo-chamber is actively what is will kill this site.

parent.body_html: The funny thing was not that we were trolling with CCP & AHS, but the fact that they actually fell for it hard.

post.body:
This guild is unequivocally retarded and so is anyone who takes it seriously. People have forgotten what shill even means and throw it around just like the word racism or bigot and it has lost its meaning (not that ruqqusers used it in right context anyway). A shill is someone who is paid to sell something, whether it be a product or an idea. As much as you'd like your CCP or (((jews))) own and control everything conspiracy theory to come to, it really isn't, especially on ruqqus. No one is being paid to promote/subvert ideologies on an obscure site that no one except old users and right wingers care about. 

Any "shills" are trolls who joined in after the +The_DonaId seethe that we created. A few of them are older trolls who went silent until recently because of the seethe from the echo-chamber while others are newer ones. These people have two ways of trolling, either going against the echo-chamber (which most do), or LARPing so far right it even makes those in the echo-chamber surprised. This is evidenced by the timing that these people started trolling, around election days and after that (the same time +The_DonaId was created). For them to join they have to be at least 1 month old users for them to know about the "takeover" and start trolling. This rules out the possibility that AHS or redditors were behind this. These trolls are likely alts for old users who use them to troll. Also +The_DonaId was coordinated by a few of us on discord to generate seethe as we were tired of the echo-chamber and wasn't because of shills or even Deux, with the only connection being Carp. Nobody on +The_DonaId is a shill. Same goes for +DeuxRAMA. It seems like the rightoid seriousposters either don't know or have forgotten the original purpose of that subreddit/guild, which is to indulge in drama and make it as fun as possible by not taking it seriously. 

If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well, all by a few of us on discord writing ridiculous statements. The fact that anyone even took it seriously shows how deep they are into the echo-chamber and unable to detect any satire or irony. This was started by people with relatively higher rep and since this was on discord, we eventually were able to get more people with high rep and influence on board. We even got kek to join on the last day. If you spent a fair amount of time on ruqqus discord (or even ruqqus), you'd recognize these names as being older users who contributed a lot to the site. The fact that no one even bothered going through the profiles makes me question if you even bothered doing any research before declaring everyone shills, most of whom had public profiles until recently. Many of these are the very people who were behind creating the good parts about the site, before voatcels took over. Also, there have been no examples of this so called "subversion" of this site except Klens guilds (on his alt accounts) being taken after he got temporarily banned. If you think more people shitting on far righters after the trolling started is evidence for shills it isn't because of shills, but because you've exposed your stupidity and are getting shit on for it. People disagreeing with you more now isn't "subversion". If you don't know this already, @Sion321 is an alt for @Emerald41, not some "whistleblower". Evidence: [1](https://ruqqus.com/+TheMemery/post/5r1h/so-sion123-was-threatened-with-a/jwmg), [2](https://imgur.com/qA3qWdb), [3](https://ruqqus.com/+DumpsterFire/post/5r3w/when-you-get-your-feelings-hurt/jwr1). Everyone in this guild fell for the bait, even though we even made it so easy to recognize. This easily destroys any form of credibility this guild has. It has done nothing valuable except expose the retardation of average ruqqusers. 

I don't expect you to take this seriously given how retarded you have to be to get here in the first place, but let this be a moment for self reflection that you're in the echo-chamber so deep that you've forgotten that people who disagree normally, people who troll, and people in the center even fucking exist and its all an us vs them mentality. The average ruqquser doesn't care about free speech anymore and are willing to censor those who disagree by means such as labelling them as shills in hopes for the admins to get them banned. I've lost hope in this site. I'll likely give up on ruqqus soon since the echo-chamber will only get worse until the update and even the update might not be enough to salvage this site. The echo-chamber is actively what is will kill this site.

If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well, all by a few of us on discord writing ridiculous statements. The fact that anyone even took it seriously shows how deep they are into the echo-chamber and unable to detect any satire or irony. This was started by people with relatively higher rep and since this was on discord, we eventually were able to get more people with high rep and influence on board. We even got kek to join on the last day. If you spent a fair amount of time on ruqqus discord (or even ruqqus), you'd recognize these names as being older users who contributed a lot to the site. The fact that no one even bothered going through the profiles makes me question if you even bothered doing any research before declaring everyone shills, most of whom had public profiles until recently. Many of these are the very people who were behind creating the good parts about the site, before voatcels took over. Also, there have been no examples of this so called "subversion" of this site except Klens guilds (on his alt accounts) being taken after he got temporarily banned. If you think more people shitting on far righters after the trolling started is evidence for shills it isn't because of shills, but because you've exposed your stupidity and are getting shit on for it. People disagreeing with you more now isn't "subversion". If you don't know this already, @Sion321 is an alt for @Emerald41, not some "whistleblower". Evidence: [1](https://ruqqus.com/+TheMemery/post/5r1h/so-sion123-was-threatened-with-a/jwmg), [2](https://imgur.com/qA3qWdb), [3](https://ruqqus.com/+DumpsterFire/post/5r3w/when-you-get-your-feelings-hurt/jwr1). Everyone in this guild fell for the bait, even though we even made it so easy to recognize. This easily destroys any form of credibility this guild has. It has done nothing valuable except expose the retardation of average ruqqusers. 

I don't expect you to take this seriously given how retarded you have to be to get here in the first place, but let this be a moment for self reflection that you're in the echo-chamber so deep that you've forgotten that people who disagree normally, people who troll, and people in the center even fucking exist and its all an us vs them mentality. The average ruqquser doesn't care about free speech anymore and are willing to censor those who disagree by means such as labelling them as shills in hopes for the admins to get them banned. I've lost hope in this site. I'll likely give up on ruqqus soon since the echo-chamber will only get worse until the update and even the update might not be enough to salvage this site. The echo-chamber is actively what is will kill this site.

As much as you'd like your CCP or (((jews))) own and control everything conspiracy theory to come to, it really isn't, especially on ruqqus. No one is being paid to promote/subvert ideologies on an obscure site that no one except old users and right wingers care about.

Any "shills" are trolls who joined in after the +The_DonaId seethe that we created. A few of them are older trolls who went silent until recently because of the seethe from the echo-chamber while others are newer ones. These people have two ways of trolling, either going against the echo-chamber (which most do), or LARPing so far right it even makes those in the echo-chamber surprised. This is evidenced by the timing that these people started trolling, around election days and after that (the same time +The_DonaId was created). For them to join they have to be at least 1 month old users for them to know about the "takeover" and start trolling. This rules out the possibility that AHS or redditors were behind this. These trolls are likely alts for old users who use them to troll. Also +The_DonaId was coordinated by a few of us on discord to generate seethe as we were tired of the echo-chamber and wasn't because of shills or even Deux, with the only connection being Carp. Nobody on +The_DonaId is a shill. Same goes for +DeuxRAMA. It seems like the rightoid seriousposters either don't know or have forgotten the original purpose of that subreddit/guild, which is to indulge in drama and make it as fun as possible by not taking it seriously.

If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well, all by a few of us on discord writing ridiculous statements. The fact that anyone even took it seriously shows how deep they are into the echo-chamber and unable to detect any satire or irony. This was started by people with relatively higher rep and since this was on discord, we eventually were able to get more people with high rep and influence on board. We even got kek to join on the last day. If you spent a fair amount of time on ruqqus discord (or even ruqqus), you'd recognize these names as being older users who contributed a lot to the site. The fact that no one even bothered going through the profiles makes me question if you even bothered doing any research before declaring everyone shills, most of whom had public profiles until recently. Many of these are the very people who were behind creating the good parts about the site, before voatcels took over. Also, there have been no examples of this so called "subversion" of this site except Klens guilds (on his alt accounts) being taken after he got temporarily banned. If you think more people shitting on far righters after the trolling started is evidence for shills it isn't because of shills, but because you've exposed your stupidity and are getting shit on for it. People disagreeing with you more now isn't "subversion". If you don't know this already, @Sion321 is an alt for @Emerald41, not some "whistleblower". Evidence: 1, 2, 3. Everyone in this guild fell for the bait, even though we even made it so easy to recognize. This easily destroys any form of credibility this guild has. It has done nothing valuable except expose the retardation of average ruqqusers.

I don't expect you to take this seriously given how retarded you have to be to get here in the first place, but let this be a moment for self reflection that you're in the echo-chamber so deep that you've forgotten that people who disagree normally, people who troll, and people in the center even fucking exist and its all an us vs them mentality. The average ruqquser doesn't care about free speech anymore and are willing to censor those who disagree by means such as labelling them as shills in hopes for the admins to get them banned. I've lost hope in this site. I'll likely give up on ruqqus soon since the echo-chamber will only get worse until the update and even the update might not be enough to salvage this site. The echo-chamber is actively what is will kill this site.

post.body:
This guild is unequivocally retarded and so is anyone who takes it seriously. People have forgotten what shill even means and throw it around just like the word racism or bigot and it has lost its meaning (not that ruqqusers used it in right context anyway). A shill is someone who is paid to sell something, whether it be a product or an idea. As much as you'd like your CCP or (((jews))) own and control everything conspiracy theory to come to, it really isn't, especially on ruqqus. No one is being paid to promote/subvert ideologies on an obscure site that no one except old users and right wingers care about. 

Any "shills" are trolls who joined in after the +The_DonaId seethe that we created. A few of them are older trolls who went silent until recently because of the seethe from the echo-chamber while others are newer ones. These people have two ways of trolling, either going against the echo-chamber (which most do), or LARPing so far right it even makes those in the echo-chamber surprised. This is evidenced by the timing that these people started trolling, around election days and after that (the same time +The_DonaId was created). For them to join they have to be at least 1 month old users for them to know about the "takeover" and start trolling. This rules out the possibility that AHS or redditors were behind this. These trolls are likely alts for old users who use them to troll. Also +The_DonaId was coordinated by a few of us on discord to generate seethe as we were tired of the echo-chamber and wasn't because of shills or even Deux, with the only connection being Carp. Nobody on +The_DonaId is a shill. Same goes for +DeuxRAMA. It seems like the rightoid seriousposters either don't know or have forgotten the original purpose of that subreddit/guild, which is to indulge in drama and make it as fun as possible by not taking it seriously. 

If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well, all by a few of us on discord writing ridiculous statements. The fact that anyone even took it seriously shows how deep they are into the echo-chamber and unable to detect any satire or irony. This was started by people with relatively higher rep and since this was on discord, we eventually were able to get more people with high rep and influence on board. We even got kek to join on the last day. If you spent a fair amount of time on ruqqus discord (or even ruqqus), you'd recognize these names as being older users who contributed a lot to the site. The fact that no one even bothered going through the profiles makes me question if you even bothered doing any research before declaring everyone shills, most of whom had public profiles until recently. Many of these are the very people who were behind creating the good parts about the site, before voatcels took over. Also, there have been no examples of this so called "subversion" of this site except Klens guilds (on his alt accounts) being taken after he got temporarily banned. If you think more people shitting on far righters after the trolling started is evidence for shills it isn't because of shills, but because you've exposed your stupidity and are getting shit on for it. People disagreeing with you more now isn't "subversion". If you don't know this already, @Sion321 is an alt for @Emerald41, not some "whistleblower". Evidence: [1](https://ruqqus.com/+TheMemery/post/5r1h/so-sion123-was-threatened-with-a/jwmg), [2](https://imgur.com/qA3qWdb), [3](https://ruqqus.com/+DumpsterFire/post/5r3w/when-you-get-your-feelings-hurt/jwr1). Everyone in this guild fell for the bait, even though we even made it so easy to recognize. This easily destroys any form of credibility this guild has. It has done nothing valuable except expose the retardation of average ruqqusers. 

I don't expect you to take this seriously given how retarded you have to be to get here in the first place, but let this be a moment for self reflection that you're in the echo-chamber so deep that you've forgotten that people who disagree normally, people who troll, and people in the center even fucking exist and its all an us vs them mentality. The average ruqquser doesn't care about free speech anymore and are willing to censor those who disagree by means such as labelling them as shills in hopes for the admins to get them banned. I've lost hope in this site. I'll likely give up on ruqqus soon since the echo-chamber will only get worse until the update and even the update might not be enough to salvage this site. The echo-chamber is actively what is will kill this site.

post.title: The difference between "trolls" and "shills"

body:
I spent an hour disassembling your argument and my computer crashed, so I will instead sum it up quickly.

I agree that *shill* (paid advertiser) is not a very strong definition because you are not paid, you are instead, a propagandist (shove [Ideology] through manipulation tactics).  Although it isn't perfect, shill just rolls off the tongue.

The CCP joke was actually funny in my opinion, and it was an okay troll (I couldn't believe you people had any funding though).  That was not shilling and we were not addressing it as such.  We are addressing other things you guys did.  You made a "seamless garment" argument about trolling and propaganda.  **You and the cabal are past the "trolling" point**, the lie is weak and nobody believes it.  Nobody makes a wall of text and bans people from everywhere for le epic troll (among other things), your actions are in direct contradiction to your words.

Do you want to fix Ruqqus?  Great!  We do too.  I would suggest arguing your points like you tried with your post above, instead of using underhanded and shady tactics, so you're already on a good start.  Opposing opinion /= shill, but propaganda tactics do.  Make a suggestion.  If people like it?  Maybe it's implemented, maybe it doesn't work out.   Who knows.  The fact of the matter is, it's not the design of Ruqqus, but the site just has more conservatives than progressives, and that's fine.  I would still be on Reddit, which is the political inverse of Ruqqus if it didn't have poor management tools and admin censorship.  **No one is entitled to have others agree, that's why we need fruitful arguments where people talk and listen**.  You need to snap the fuck out of it *before* you can't go back.  I have the slightest hope you will listen to reason.

body: That was funny though, ngl.  I couldn't believe you people had funding, so I wasn't on the bandwagon.
body_html: That was funny though, ngl. I couldn't believe you people had funding, so I wasn't on the bandwagon.

parent.body: The funny thing was not that we were trolling with CCP & AHS, but the fact that they actually fell for it *hard*.
parent.body_html: The funny thing was not that we were trolling with CCP & AHS, but the fact that they actually fell for it hard.

post.body:
This guild is unequivocally retarded and so is anyone who takes it seriously. People have forgotten what shill even means and throw it around just like the word racism or bigot and it has lost its meaning (not that ruqqusers used it in right context anyway). A shill is someone who is paid to sell something, whether it be a product or an idea. As much as you'd like your CCP or (((jews))) own and control everything conspiracy theory to come to, it really isn't, especially on ruqqus. No one is being paid to promote/subvert ideologies on an obscure site that no one except old users and right wingers care about. 

Any "shills" are trolls who joined in after the +The_DonaId seethe that we created. A few of them are older trolls who went silent until recently because of the seethe from the echo-chamber while others are newer ones. These people have two ways of trolling, either going against the echo-chamber (which most do), or LARPing so far right it even makes those in the echo-chamber surprised. This is evidenced by the timing that these people started trolling, around election days and after that (the same time +The_DonaId was created). For them to join they have to be at least 1 month old users for them to know about the "takeover" and start trolling. This rules out the possibility that AHS or redditors were behind this. These trolls are likely alts for old users who use them to troll. Also +The_DonaId was coordinated by a few of us on discord to generate seethe as we were tired of the echo-chamber and wasn't because of shills or even Deux, with the only connection being Carp. Nobody on +The_DonaId is a shill. Same goes for +DeuxRAMA. It seems like the rightoid seriousposters either don't know or have forgotten the original purpose of that subreddit/guild, which is to indulge in drama and make it as fun as possible by not taking it seriously. 

If you're now wondering about the screenshots on +TheMemery, the discord server and the Sion ordeal, those were faked by us as well, all by a few of us on discord writing ridiculous statements. The fact that anyone even took it seriously shows how deep they are into the echo-chamber and unable to detect any satire or irony. This was started by people with relatively higher rep and since this was on discord, we eventually were able to get more people with high rep and influence on board. We even got kek to join on the last day. If you spent a fair amount of time on ruqqus discord (or even ruqqus), you'd recognize these names as being older users who contributed a lot to the site. The fact that no one even bothered going through the profiles makes me question if you even bothered doing any research before declaring everyone shills, most of whom had public profiles until recently. Many of these are the very people who were behind creating the good parts about the site, before voatcels took over. Also, there have been no examples of this so called "subversion" of this site except Klens guilds (on his alt accounts) being taken after he got temporarily banned. If you think more people shitting on far righters after the trolling started is evidence for shills it isn't because of shills, but because you've exposed your stupidity and are getting shit on for it. People disagreeing with you more now isn't "subversion". If you don't know this already, @Sion321 is an alt for @Emerald41, not some "whistleblower". Evidence: [1](https://ruqqus.com/+TheMemery/post/5r1h/so-sion123-was-threatened-with-a/jwmg), [2](https://imgur.com/qA3qWdb), [3](https://ruqqus.com/+DumpsterFire/post/5r3w/when-you-get-your-feelings-hurt/jwr1). Everyone in this guild fell for the bait, even though we even made it so easy to recognize. This easily destroys any form of credibility this guild has. It has done nothing valuable except expose the retardation of average ruqqusers. 

I don't expect you to take this seriously given how retarded you have to be to get here in the first place, but let this be a moment for self reflection that you're in the echo-chamber so deep that you've forgotten that people who disagree normally, people who troll, and people in the center even fucking exist and its all an us vs them mentality. The average ruqquser doesn't care about free speech anymore and are willing to censor those who disagree by means such as labelling them as shills in hopes for the admins to get them banned. I've lost hope in this site. I'll likely give up on ruqqus soon since the echo-chamber will only get worse until the update and even the update might not be enough to salvage this site. The echo-chamber is actively what is will kill this site.

post.title: The difference between "trolls" and "shills"

body: I don't really think they are funded with the CCP.  Their shilling is *not* worth the paper lmao.
body_html: I don't really think they are funded with the CCP. Their shilling is not worth the paper lmao.

parent.body:
One has an agenda, the other wants lulz.

However, it is documented fact the CCP has shills active all over the internet and even in the physical world.

I stopped bothering to check profiles because anyone of consequence has their profile set to private- hence my bio.

I was the 3rd member of this guild.  This was my comment on the original post-



>It bears saying- Opposing view =/= shilling. Some people hold contrary views. A shill is someone with an agenda to push and is actively looking to shift public opinion with their actions. We're already walking a fine line here on Ruqqus in that we are pretty quickly becoming a rightwing echo chamber and chasing off anyone who holds an opposing view. It's important to specify a pattern of behavior and not just a history of contrary views.  If we want to remain a "free speech platform," then we need to hold free speech as the gold standard and not shame or censor people for simply having a different opinion.

This guild may be populated by retards, but Poe's Law remains at play and nothing creates more retards than feeding the retardation.  Your prophecy is self-fulfilling and you create the issue you proclaim as being critical to this site's downfall.

In short- go fuck yourself you fucking fuck and fuck off with your little clique of Discord circle jerks and go Dutch oven one another somewhere where no one gives a shit about you.  So, I guess that means stay here and keep doing what you're doing.
parent.body_html:
One has an agenda, the other wants lulz.

However, it is documented fact the CCP has shills active all over the internet and even in the physical world.

I stopped bothering to check profiles because anyone of consequence has their profile set to private- hence my bio.

I was the 3rd member of this guild. This was my comment on the original post-

It bears saying- Opposing view =/= shilling. Some people hold contrary views. A shill is someone with an agenda to push and is actively looking to shift public opinion with their actions. We're already walking a fine line here on Ruqqus in that we are pretty quickly becoming a rightwing echo chamber and chasing off anyone who holds an opposing view. It's important to specify a pattern of behavior and not just a history of contrary views. If we want to remain a "free speech platform," then we need to hold free speech as the gold standard and not shame or censor people for simply having a different opinion.

This guild may be populated by retards, but Poe's Law remains at play and nothing creates more retards than feeding the retardation. Your prophecy is self-fulfilling and you create the issue you proclaim as being critical to this site's downfall.

In short- go fuck yourself you fucking fuck and fuck off with your little clique of Discord circle jerks and go Dutch oven one another somewhere where no one gives a shit about you. So, I guess that means stay here and keep doing what you're doing.

post.title: The difference between "trolls" and "shills"

author.bio: No reason for me to be here anymore. If you’re interested in anime art ping me and maybe I’ll respond.
author.bio_html: No reason for me to be here anymore. If you’re interested in anime art ping me and maybe I’ll respond.

body: Why does trolling need to have a serious propaganda purpose? The whole purpose of it is to troll people, generate seethe and laugh at people being retarded.
body_html: Why does trolling need to have a serious propaganda purpose? The whole purpose of it is to troll people, generate seethe and laugh at people being retarded.

parent.body:
I spent an hour disassembling your argument and my computer crashed, so I will instead sum it up quickly.

I agree that *shill* (paid advertiser) is not a very strong definition because you are not paid, you are instead, a propagandist (shove [Ideology] through manipulation tactics).  Although it isn't perfect, shill just rolls off the tongue.

The CCP joke was actually funny in my opinion, and it was an okay troll (I couldn't believe you people had any funding though).  That was not shilling and we were not addressing it as such.  We are addressing other things you guys did.  You made a "seamless garment" argument about trolling and propaganda.  **You and the cabal are past the "trolling" point**, the lie is weak and nobody believes it.  Nobody makes a wall of text and bans people from everywhere for le epic troll (among other things), your actions are in direct contradiction to your words.

Do you want to fix Ruqqus?  Great!  We do too.  I would suggest arguing your points like you tried with your post above, instead of using underhanded and shady tactics, so you're already on a good start.  Opposing opinion /= shill, but propaganda tactics do.  Make a suggestion.  If people like it?  Maybe it's implemented, maybe it doesn't work out.   Who knows.  The fact of the matter is, it's not the design of Ruqqus, but the site just has more conservatives than progressives, and that's fine.  I would still be on Reddit, which is the political inverse of Ruqqus if it didn't have poor management tools and admin censorship.  **No one is entitled to have others agree, that's why we need fruitful arguments where people talk and listen**.  You need to snap the fuck out of it *before* you can't go back.  I have the slightest hope you will listen to reason.

I have the slightest hope you will listen to reason.

The fact that anyone even took it seriously shows how deep they are into the echo-chamber and unable to detect any satire or irony. This was started by people with relatively higher rep and since this was on discord, we eventually were able to get more people with high rep and influence on board. We even got kek to join on the last day. If you spent a fair amount of time on ruqqus discord (or even ruqqus), you'd recognize these names as being older users who contributed a lot to the site. The fact that no one even bothered going through the profiles makes me question if you even bothered doing any research before declaring everyone shills, most of whom had public profiles until recently. Many of these are the very people who were behind creating the good parts about the site, before voatcels took over. Also, there have been no examples of this so called "subversion" of this site except Klens guilds (on his alt accounts) being taken after he got temporarily banned. If you think more people shitting on far righters after the trolling started is evidence for shills it isn't because of shills, but because you've exposed your stupidity and are getting shit on for it. People disagreeing with you more now isn't "subversion". If you don't know this already, @Sion321 is an alt for @Emerald41, not some "whistleblower". Evidence: 1, 2, 3. Everyone in this guild fell for the bait, even though we even made it so easy to recognize. This easily destroys any form of credibility this guild has. It has done nothing valuable except expose the retardation of average ruqqusers.

I don't expect you to take this seriously given how retarded you have to be to get here in the first place, but let this be a moment for self reflection that you're in the echo-chamber so deep that you've forgotten that people who disagree normally, people who troll, and people in the center even fucking exist and its all an us vs them mentality. The average ruqquser doesn't care about free speech anymore and are willing to censor those who disagree by means such as labelling them as shills in hopes for the admins to get them banned. I've lost hope in this site. I'll likely give up on ruqqus soon since the echo-chamber will only get worse until the update and even the update might not be enough to salvage this site. The echo-chamber is actively what is will kill this site.
